Updated my sights. The numbers represent the font size (1.0/0.8/0.6/0.4), as each tank has a different zoom.
The default range is 6km, but 3km is also available.
You can also make your own changes in other sections (e.g. reload timer & colour).

Put all the files or the entire folder into - Windows: C:\Users\<"user name">\Documents\My Games\WarThunder\Saves\<"user ID">\production\UserSights
If you don't have the "UserSights" folder, simply create one named that and place the "all_tanks" folder inside.

"Options" > "Ground vehicle Battle settings" > ”Sight settings“, pick one and "Save"....

BMPT专用瞄具(BMPT Sight) : FW3_USSR_BMPT_ZC1_40120
专用瞄具-C系列 (Special Purpose - A) :

适配倍率（Zoom of sight） : #bmpt
4.0x - 12.0x

使用方法 : 已整合进压缩包内
Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

Schindibee modified Centurion AVRE sight (Works for M728 too). Modified to work as of January 2026. I didn't ask for permission from Schindibee for this lmao, so idk if it's gonna be take down.

Anyway

1) The installation path may be moved to OneDrive by the game for example.

C:\Users\(USER)\OneDrive\Documents\My Games\WarThunder\Saves\(NUMBERS)\production\UserSights\all_tanks

Make sure in production you add UserSights (and all_tanks) folder if it ain't there

1.1) In game, Go to options > Ground Vehicle Battles Settings > Sight settings
